mapper.update:
UPDATE so_reminder
order_code = #{orderCode},
user_id = #{userId},
reminder_desc = #{reminderDesc},
platform_id = #{platformId},
merchant_id = #{merchantId},
user_phone = #{userPhone},
phone_record = #{phoneRecord},
reminder_type = #{reminderType},
ask_category_id = #{askCategoryId},
ask_category_desc = #{askCategoryDesc},
reminder_object = #{reminderObject},
ask_category_two_id = #{askCategoryTwoId},
status = #{status},
update_time = #{updateTime},
create_time = #{createTime},
WHERE id = #{id}
